name: Bun Runtime
description: Installs Bun - fast all-in-one JavaScript runtime and toolkit for Arch Linux

version.description: Bun version to install (latest, canary, or specific version like 1.0.21) - only works with official install method

installMethod.description: Installation method: pacman (default), yay, or official script

strictInstall.description: If true, fail on unavailable method. If false, fallback to next available method

globalPackages.description: Comma-separated list of packages to install globally via bun

installNodeCompat.description: Install Node.js compatibility shims (node, npm, npx commands pointing to bun)
